Data Fields
DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig_t Struct Reference
aoaProc DPU External » aoaProc DPU External Data Structures

AoAProcHWA DPU static configuration parameters. More...

#include <dpu/aoa2dproc/aoa2dprochwa.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t numTxAntennas
 Number of transmit antennas.
 
uint8_t numRxAntennas
 Number of receive antennas.
 
uint8_t numVirtualAnt
 Number of virtual antennas.
 
uint16_t numRangeBins
 Number of range bins.
 
uint16_t numDopplerChirps
 Number of chirps for Doppler computation purposes. For example, in TDM/BPM-MIMO scheme, this is the physical chirps in a frame per transmit antenna i.e numDopplerChirps = numChirpsPerFrame / numTxAntennas.
 
uint16_t numDopplerBins
 Number of doppler bins.
 
float rangeStep
 Range conversion factor for range FFT index to meters.
 
float dopplerStep
 Doppler conversion factor for Doppler FFT index to m/s.
 
ANTDEF_AntGeometry * antDef
 Pointer to antenna geometry definition.
 
float lambdaOverDist
 Wavelength over antenna spacing factor.
 

Detailed Description

AoAProcHWA DPU static configuration parameters.

The following conditions must be satisfied: 

   numTxAntennas * numRxAntennas * numDopplerChirps * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) <= 16 KB (one HWA memory bank)
   numTxAntennas * numRxAntennas * numDopplerBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t) <= 32 KB (two HWA memory banks)
